author: Marvel Entertainment
description:

Launching 2026 on PS5 and PC.

title: Marvel Studios' The Fantastic Four | Galactus Popcorn Vessel

author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
This week, we’ll speak with Avengers Academy comics writer Anthony Oliviera about his work with the next generation of super-powered heroes. Then, Marvel Senior Manager of Franchise events Mikey Trujillo teases Marvel’s plans at this year’s San Diego Comic-Con. Later on, we’ll catch up on what Riri Williams has been up to ahead of Marvel Television’s Ironheart premiere. 

00:00 - Welcome back!
1:46 - The next gen of super-powered heroes with Avengers Academy comics writer Anthony Oliviera 
11:52 - Marvel's plans for SDCC with Marvel Senior Manager of Franchise events Mikey Trujillo 
20:57 - Catch up on Riri Williams before Marvel Television’s Ironheart premiere 

► Watch Marvel on Disney+: https://bit.ly/2XyBSIW
► Subscribe to Marvel on YouTube: http://bit.ly/WeO3YJ

title: A Sneak Peek at Marvel’s Plans for San Diego Comic-Con!
